document_data.caption: The Watermens' Hall during springtime.
document_data.name: Watermens' Hall
document_data.mainbody: '''Watermens' Hall''' was the guildhall of the [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Guild of Watermen]].<ref>
document_data.Location: The Watermens' Hall was located along [[Dock Street (Waterdeep)|Dock Street]], in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Services: This building doubled as a warehouse for the Guild of Watermen, acting as a place where they could store their ferries and [[skiff]]s. As well as a place to store any and all things found while trying to keep [[Deepwater Harbor]] clean.
document_data.Reputation: The Watermens' Hall was among some of the more notable and recognizable guildhalls in the Dock Ward. Like other guildhalls in the Dock Ward, the Watermen's Hall was considered by locals to be a landmark.
